title: Ribbon, ca. 1919
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: warp printed on plain compound satin
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
description: Broad satin ribbon with woven gold coin dot pattern design. Chiné-printed in a multi-colored pattern of large falling leaves. Both selvages present on all samples.
